sign-in-with-google-info: Sign in with google, single login is valid for one hour. All features are available and you can upgrade to a official account along the way.
trial-info: Free to try for one hour without signing up. All features are available and you can upgrade to a official account along the way.

success.title: Congratulations! Sign up successfully
success.description: we will get you in after {{seconds}}s, or click button go home right now

not-found.title: Sorry, no content here.
not-found.description: if you think there must be something here, please send email to us

fail.title: Sorry, sign in with Google failed.
fail.description: Please try again or sign in using a different method.
